Location.Description: You stand in a small room. A ladder leads up towards light, while a corridor extends east into darkness.
You step into the corridor and immediately plummet into an abyssal pit.

As you climb the ladder the fresh spring breeze blows around you. Stepping off the last rung you find yourself surrounded by a beautiful meadow. The ladder remains beneath you, leading back underground.
As you walk through the portal, you realize you've made a terrible mistake and entered the cow dimension!
